spec_data.Name: cyrus-sasl-gssapi
spec_data.Description:
The cyrus-sasl-gssapi package contains the Cyrus SASL plugins which
support GSSAPI authentication. GSSAPI is commonly used for Kerberos
authentication.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 11:02:16 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: GSSAPI authentication support for Cyrus SASL
